articles.title: American Airlines extends alcohol service suspension after Southwest Airlines assault - NBC News
articles.description: American Airlines is extending its suspension of in-flight alcohol service until September following reports of unruly passengers aboard other airlines.
articles.content:

articles.title: Christian Pulisic earns place in history as Chelsea wins Champions League - New York Post
articles.description: Christian Pulisic became the first American man to play in a Champions League final on Saturday.
articles.content:
PORTO, Portugal Christian Pulisic became the first American man to play in a Champions League final on Saturday.
He came away with a winner’s medal, too and almost a goal.

articles.author: Oliver Trapnell
articles.title: China wants to ‘own America’ within 15 years warns Joe Biden amid Wuhan lab probe - Daily Express
articles.description: CHINA wants to 'own America', Joe Biden has warned after tensions between Washington and Beijing flared in the midst of the COVID-19 origin probe.

articles.author: Sabrina Tavernise
articles.title: An Arms Race in America: Gun Buying Spiked During the Pandemic. It’s Still Up. - The New York Times
articles.description: Preliminary research data show that about a fifth of all Americans who bought guns last year were first-time gun owners. Sales usually spike around elections, but the sheer volume is notable.
